A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved this movie.  It was very well done and the acting was fantastic. It brought tears to my eyes a few times with a sense of nostalgia for the original movies.  The action sequences were well done. I enjoyed the \nhumor but could see why some reviewers might dislike the timing of the jokes. The story was not exactly what I expected but enjoyable and definitely not predictable. I agree with the professional reviews this is the movie of the year!
